rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A minimalistic entrance area with clean lines and ample natural lighting to greet visitors.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living space that doubles as a dining area with large windows for ventilation and sunlight.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining area within the living space, featuring a minimalist design with functional furniture.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with a walk-in closet and minimalistic decor for enhanced privacy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom featuring simple design and ample storage space.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom designed for comfort and functionality.

rooms.name: Shared Bathroom
rooms.description: Bathroom shared between the guest bedroom and other common areas, designed for efficiency.

openings.description: A modern, minimalist entrance door aligned with Vastu principles for positive energy.
Large windows to allow ample natural light and ventilation in the living area.
Double garage door for two-car parking, ensuring ease of access while maintaining security.

garage.name: Two-Car Garage
garage.description: A spacious two-car garage designed for easy vehicle access and storage of vehicles.
